name: nsfw-extension
description: Chrome browser extension for detecting and bluring NSFW images.

scripts.copy: cp src/content.js dist/src/ && cp src/nsfw_classes.js dist/src/ && cp src/nsfw_wrapper.js dist/src/
scripts.clear: rm dist/src/content.js && rm dist/src/nsfw_classes.js && rm dist/src/nsfw_wrapper.js
scripts.build: parcel build src/background.js -d dist/src/ -o background && npm run copy

author: GramThanos
